title: Memoirs of the Bathtub Psychic - The True Story of a Clairvoyant and Her Dogs
description: Memoirs of the Bathtub Psychic is the heartwarming true story of a woman's relationship with her Newfoundland dogs, who teach her to trust in the psychic abilities she was afraid to acknowledge for many years and to cultivate her instincts for holistic healing and animal communication. It's a compelling read for all animal lovers. Memoirs will benefit pet owners interested in holistic health and raw food canine diets, critics of excessive vaccination, and those interested in psychic mediums, animal communication and past lives. Ms. Elion has a dynamic, poetic voice, and her work has been well received by holistic veterinarians and professional psychic mediums alike.
author: Bethanne Elion
